response.original_title: Quantum Leap - The Hope HB.T Bike
response.overview: The Hope HB T is a game changer in the world of bicycle design. Almost 30 years since the iconic partnership between British Cycling and Lotus emerged, Jonathan Shubert takes an exciting first look at the next big ‘Hope’ for Team GB. Jon talks to engineers, the mechanics and the Olympic athletes tasked with developing this futuristic bike for Tokyo 2021. But, is this design as fast as it looks? Jon takes this radical new design to a wind tunnel to find out.  Could the Hope HB. T bring home Gold for Great Britain?
response.title: Quantum Leap - The Hope HB.T Bike

results.name: Quantum Leap: Team GB Hope HB.T Track Bike
